snippet: The federal hearing will decide which documents in a lawsuit will be made public; filings in the suit briefly revealed the identity of the informer in 2010.
lead_paragraph: The federal hearing will decide which documents in a lawsuit will be made public; filings in the suit briefly revealed the identity of the informer in 2010.

headline.seo: Brooklyn Judge Orders Closed Hearing in Informer Case
headline.main: Judge in Brooklyn Orders Closed Hearing in Informer Case
headline.print_headline: Judge in Brooklyn Orders Closed Hearing in Informer Case
